actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the seizure and forfeiture of vessels, vehicles, and aircraft used to illegally transport into the United States certain aliens, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides, under the Immigration and Nationality Act, for the seizure and forfeiture of vessels, vehicles, and aircraft used to illegally transport into the United States specified aliens. States exceptions to such seizure and forfeiture provision, including a vessel, vehicle, or aircraft used as a common carrier unless the owner or other person in charge was at the time of the alleged illegal act a consenting party or privy thereto.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the seizure and forfeiture of vessels, vehicles, and aircraft used to illegally transport into the United States certain aliens, and for other purposes.
